title: Smoking New Cigars With Steve Saka
itunes:title: Smoking New Cigars With Steve Saka
description:
This week on The Cigar Authority we are joined by Steve Saka of Dunbarton Tobacco & Trust. We will light up some new cigars including the Sobremesa Short Churchill and Mi Querida. We will discuss how the past 8 months have been for Steve as a brand owner and look into what the future may hold.

Also we will name the winners of the #TCABOOM campaign and let you know who won a 5 pack of the SOLD-OUT CroMagnon Firecracker.

All this and the usual madness on The Cigar Authority
